DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : To investigate effect 6 month low carbohydrate diet obese men marker heart health include blood fat , blood clotting factor , inflammatory marker level body fat . To investigate added effect heart health regular moderate exercise may combine low carbohydrate diet obese men .
DOC.brief_title: Low Carb Diets & Exercise Cardiovascular Disease ( CVD ) Reduction
DOC.criteria: male 2165 year body mass index ( BMI ) 2740kg/m2 currently lose weight physically able exercise moderate intensity
